entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm over higher terrain. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
